title: dharshanamu sEya
sahitya:
darshanamu sEya nA taramA



anupallavi



parAmarshinci nIvu nanu manniccavalenu shiva



caraNam 1



gOpurambulannu kaDugoppa kambamula bhU-sthApitambagu shilala

taruNula yATalanu

     dIpalA varusalanu divya vAhanamulanu pApahara sEvinci

bahirmukhuDaiti shiva



caraNam 2



tarali padiyAru pradakSiNamu lonarinci paranindya vacanamula

bAguga nADucunu

     orula bhAmala jUci uppongitini gAni vara shivAkSara yuga

japamu sEyanaiti shiva



caraNam 3



hATaka samambaina adbhutAkrtini nE nATa jEsukoni hrnnAlIka

munanu mATi

     mATiki jUci mai maraci unDunadi yAtalA tyAgarAjArcita pAda

shiva
